function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Exclusionary migration policy exacerbating socio-economic disparities","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High unemployment rates and long-term unemployment","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in people queuing in front of centrelink offices","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Job losses of 14%-25% with low-income workers twice as likely to be affected","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Systematic flaws in the operation of state enforcement regimes, resulting in widespread employer non-compliance","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Widespread loss of jobs, hours, and income","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid outflow of capital from emerging countries leading to economic instability and poverty","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Tourism industry collapse","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Falls in remittances by migrants","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Supply chains restructuring and nearshoring may lead to smaller headcounts and vulnerable workforces in emerging economies.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of domestic supply chain for critical medical supplies like ventilators.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"National self-sufficiency and local manufacturing as a response to global crises.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Strain on global food supply chains","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vulnerability of pharmaceutical supply chains","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Divisions in europe exacerbating due to pandemic response differences","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Opposition to mutual co-financing of public expenditures","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of demand in the economy due to the covid-19 crisis","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure of irresponsible government policies and decline of industrial sectors","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential repetition of covid-19 type events in the future","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Health workers facing physical and mental health risks due to long working hours and shortage of protective equipment.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Escalation of domestic violence during the covid-19 pandemic.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Alteration of parenting agreements causing increased family stress and strain on courts during the pandemic.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased managerial prerogative allowing changes to employees’ duties and work arrangements.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of health protections and economic support for garment workers in asian supply chains","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Women in feminised sectors at risk of continued exposure to the virus","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of strict health and safety measures in health and social work sectors","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cultural insensitivity in health response and decision-making","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor nutrition and inadequate housing infrastructure heighten susceptibility to the pandemic within indigenous communities.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of domestic violence due to housing and financial stress within indigenous communities during the pandemic.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disproportionately high incidence rates of disease among first nations peoples","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High mobile population and exposure to fly-in fly-out workers","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in maintaining treatment for chronic conditions, such as access to dialysis","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lifting of onshore gas exploration moratoria","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exclusion of wind and solar from the us covid-19 stimulus package","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Support for coal operations under a major drinking water reservoir in highly emissions-intensive maritime transportation sector, potentially leading to localized outbreaks of contagious diseases in manufacturing facilities.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Suspension of environmental pollution laws and expansion of fossil fuel extractive industries may lead to increased air and water pollution, contributing to respiratory illnesses and environmental degradation.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unequal impact of the pandemic on different social groups due to differences in living conditions and access to resources.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mixed environmental effects of the pandemic, including improvements in air quality and reduction of pollution due to decreased travel, but also potential negative consequences for wildlife and ecological balance.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Chronic under-funding of the world health organization who leading to limited resources for global health governance.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Weakening of multilateral institutions,
